description.lang: The 86-100 plug-in is a non-dimming switch which plugs into a standard AC outlet, and allows remote control of On, Off lights and AC operated appliances. Compact design allows second wall AC outlet to remain free.Serves as a node to repeat the signal in the network, extending the overall Z-Wave mesh wireless network rangeThe 86-100 uses the latest 500 series Z-Wave chip for longer range, over-air-firmware update, and easier inclusion process, providing these features are also supported by the gateway or controller.
The LED indicator will be ON whenever the connected appliance is Off, and turns OFF when the connected device is ON.
the LED indicator will be OFF when the connected appliance is ON, and the LED indicator will be ON when the connected appliance is OFF
the LED indicator will be ON when the connected appliance is ON, and the LED indicator will be OFF when the connected appliance is OFF
the LED indicator is always OFF regardless of the load condition
